AUTH_CHANGE_EMAIL_TTL_IN_MINUTES.description: Expiry time for a change email request, default is 1440 minutes(1 day)

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: AWS Access Key for S3 storage.

AWS_QUERYSTRING_AUTH.description: Enables querystring auth for S3 urls

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: AWS Secret Key for S3 storage.

CELERY_BROKER_URL.description: Where celery should get tasks, default is Redis URL

CELERY_RESULT_BACKEND.description: Where celery should put task results, default is Redis URL

CERTIFICATE_CREATION_DELAY_IN_HOURS.description: The number of hours to delay automated certificate creation after a course run ends.

CLOUDFRONT_DIST.description: The Cloundfront distribution to use for static assets

COUPON_REQUEST_SHEET_ID.description: ID of the Google Sheet that contains requests for coupons

CRON_COURSERUN_SYNC_DAYS.description: 'day_of_week' value for 'sync-courseruns-data' scheduled task (default will run once a day).

CRON_COURSERUN_SYNC_HOURS.description: 'hours' value for the 'sync-courseruns-data' scheduled task (defaults to midnight)

CRON_COURSE_CERTIFICATES_DAYS.description: 'day_of_week' value for 'generate-course-certificate' scheduled task (default will run once a day).

CRON_COURSE_CERTIFICATES_HOURS.description: 'hours' value for the 'generate-course-certificate' scheduled task (defaults to midnight)

CSRF_TRUSTED_ORIGINS.description: Comma separated string of trusted domains that should be CSRF exempt

CYBERSOURCE_EXPORT_SERVICE_ADDRESS_OPERA.description: Whether just the name or the name and address should be used in exports verification. Refer to Cybersource docs.

CYBERSOURCE_EXPORT_SERVICE_ADDRESS_WEIGH.description: The weight of the address in determining whether a user passes exports checks. Refer to Cybersource docs.

CYBERSOURCE_EXPORT_SERVICE_NAME_WEIGHT.description: The weight of the name in determining whether a user passes exports checks. Refer to Cybersource docs.

CYBERSOURCE_EXPORT_SERVICE_SANCTIONS_LIS.description: Additional sanctions lists to validate for exports. Refer to Cybersource docs.

CYBERSOURCE_INQUIRY_LOG_NACL_ENCRYPTION_.description: The public key to encrypt export results with for our own security purposes. Should be a base64 encoded NaCl public key.

CYBERSOURCE_WSDL_URL.description: The URL to the cybersource WSDL

DEFERRAL_REQUEST_WORKSHEET_ID.description: ID of the worksheet within the enrollment change request spreadsheet that contains enrollment deferral requests

DIGITAL_CREDENTIALS_DEEP_LINK_URL.description: URL at which to deep link the learner to for the digital credentials wallet

DRIVE_API_PROJECT_ID.description: ID for the Google API project where the credentials were created

DRIVE_CLIENT_ID.description: Client ID from Google API credentials

DRIVE_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Client secret from Google API credentials

DRIVE_OUTPUT_FOLDER_ID.description: ID of the Drive folder where newly created Sheets should be kept

DRIVE_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_CREDS.description: The contents of the Service Account credentials JSON to use for Google API auth

DRIVE_SHARED_ID.description: ID of the Shared Drive (a.k.a. Team Drive). This is equal to the top-level folder ID.

DRIVE_WEBHOOK_ASSIGNMENT_MAX_AGE_DAYS.description: The number of days from the last update that a coupon assignment sheet should still be considered 'fresh', i.e.: should still be monitored for changes via webhook/file watch.

DRIVE_WEBHOOK_ASSIGNMENT_WAIT.description: The number of seconds to wait to process a coupon assignment sheet after we receive a webhook request from that sheet. The task to process the sheet is scheduled this many seconds in the future.

DRIVE_WEBHOOK_CHANNEL_ID.description: Channel ID to use for requests to get push notifications for file changes

DRIVE_WEBHOOK_EXPIRATION_MINUTES.description: The number of minutes after creation that a webhook (push notification) for a Drive file will expire (Google does not accept an expiration beyond 24 hours, and if the expiration is not provided via API, it defaults to 1 hour).

DRIVE_WEBHOOK_RENEWAL_PERIOD_MINUTES.description: The maximum time difference (in minutes) from the present time to a webhook expiration date to consider a webhook 'fresh', i.e.: not in need of renewal. If the time difference is less than this value, the webhook should be renewed.

EDX_API_CLIENT_TIMEOUT.description: Timeout (in seconds) for requests made via the edX API client

ENROLLMENT_CHANGE_SHEET_ID.description: ID of the Google Sheet that contains the enrollment change request worksheets (refunds, transfers, etc)

GOOGLE_DOMAIN_VERIFICATION_TAG_VALUE.description: The value of the meta tag used by Google to verify the owner of a domain (used for enabling push notifications)

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: The name of the review app

HUBSPOT_CREATE_USER_FORM_ID.description: Form ID for Hubspot Forms API

HUBSPOT_ERROR_CHECK_FREQUENCY.description: How many seconds between Hubspot API error checks

HUBSPOT_FOOTER_FORM_GUID.description: Form guid over hub spot for footer block.

HUBSPOT_NEW_COURSES_FORM_GUID.description: Form guid over hub spot for new courses email subscription form.

LOGOUT_REDIRECT_URL.description: Url to redirect to after logout, typically Open edX's own logout url

MAILGUN_BATCH_CHUNK_SIZE.description: Maximum number of emails to send in a batch

MAILGUN_KEY.description: The token for authenticating against the Mailgun API

MAILGUN_SENDER_DOMAIN.description: The domain to send mailgun email through

MEDIA_ROOT.description: The root directory for locally stored media. Typically not used.

MITOL_DIGITAL_CREDENTIALS_HMAC_SECRET.description: HMAC secret to sign digital credentials requests with

MITOL_DIGITAL_CREDENTIALS_VERIFY_SERVICE.description: Base URL for sing-and-verify service to call for digital credentials

MITXPRO_BASE_URL.description: Base url for the application in the format PROTOCOL://HOSTNAME[:PORT]

MITXPRO_DB_CONN_MAX_AGE.description: Maximum age of connection to Postgres in seconds

MITXPRO_DB_DISABLE_SSL.description: Disables SSL to postgres if set to True

MITXPRO_EMAIL_BACKEND.description: The default email backend to use for outgoing email. This is used in some places by django itself. See `NOTIFICATION_EMAIL_BACKEND` for the backend used for most application emails.

MITXPRO_ENVIRONMENT.description: The execution environment that the app is in (e.g. dev, staging, prod)

MITXPRO_FROM_EMAIL.description: E-mail to use for the from field

MITXPRO_NOTIFICATION_EMAIL_BACKEND.description: The email backend to use for application emails

MITXPRO_REGISTRATION_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Access token to secure Open edX registration API with

MITXPRO_REPLY_TO_ADDRESS.description: E-mail to use for reply-to address of emails

MITXPRO_SECURE_SSL_HOST.description: Hostame to redirect non-secure requests to. Overrides value from HOST header.

MITXPRO_SITE_ID.description: The default site id for django sites framework

MITXPRO_SUPPORT_EMAIL.description: Email address listed for customer support

MITXPRO_USE_S3.description: Use S3 for storage backend (required on Heroku)

OPENEDX_API_BASE_URL.description: The base URL for the Open edX API

OPENEDX_API_CLIENT_ID.description: The OAuth2 client id to connect to Open edX with

OPENEDX_API_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The OAuth2 client secret to connect to Open edX with

OPENEDX_API_KEY.description: edX API key (EDX_API_KEY setting in Open edX)

OPENEDX_BASE_REDIRECT_URL.description: The base redirect URL for an OAuth Application for the Open edX API

OPENEDX_OAUTH_APP_NAME.description: The 'name' value for the Open edX OAuth Application

OPENEDX_SERVICE_WORKER_API_TOKEN.description: Active access token with staff level permissions to use with OpenEdX API client for service tasks

OPENEDX_SERVICE_WORKER_USERNAME.description: Username of the user whose token has been set in OPENEDX_SERVICE_WORKER_API_TOKEN

OPENEDX_TOKEN_EXPIRES_HOURS.description: The number of hours until an access token for the Open edX API expires

REFUND_REQUEST_WORKSHEET_ID.description: ID of the worksheet within the enrollment change request spreadsheet that contains enrollment refund requests

REPAIR_COURSEWARE_USERS_FREQUENCY.description: How many seconds between repairing courseware records for faulty users

RETRY_FAILED_EDX_ENROLLMENT_FREQUENCY.description: How many seconds between retrying failed edX enrollments

ROBOTS_CACHE_TIMEOUT.description: How long the robots.txt file should be cached

SHEETS_ADMIN_EMAILS.description: Comma-separated list of emails for users that should be added as an editor for all newly created Sheets

SHEETS_DATE_FORMAT.description: Python strptime format for datetime columns in enrollment management spreadsheets

SHEETS_DATE_ONLY_FORMAT.description: Python strptime format for date columns (no time) in enrollment management spreadsheets

SHEETS_DATE_TIMEZONE.description: The name of the timezone that should be assumed for date/time values in spreadsheets. Choose from a value in the TZ database (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones).

SHEETS_DEFERRAL_FIRST_ROW.description: The first row (as it appears in the spreadsheet) of data that our scripts should consider processing in the deferral request spreadsheet

SHEETS_MONITORING_FREQUENCY.description: The frequency that the Drive folder should be checked for bulk coupon Sheets that need processing

SHEETS_REFUND_COMPLETED_DATE_COL.description: The zero-based index of the enrollment change sheet column that contains the row completion date

SHEETS_REFUND_ERROR_COL.description: The zero-based index of the enrollment change sheet column that contains row processing error messages

SHEETS_REFUND_FIRST_ROW.description: The first row (as it appears in the spreadsheet) of data that our scripts should consider processing in the refund request spreadsheet

SHEETS_REFUND_PROCESSOR_COL.description: The zero-based index of the enrollment change sheet column that contains the user that processed the row

SHEETS_REFUND_SKIP_ROW_COL.description: The zero-based index of the enrollment change sheet column that indicates whether the row should be skipped

SHEETS_TASK_OFFSET.description: How many seconds to wait in between executing different Sheets tasks in series

SITE_NAME.description: Name of the site. e.g MIT xPRO

STATUS_TOKEN.description: Token to access the status API.

USE_X_FORWARDED_HOST.description: Set HOST header to original domain accessed by user

VOUCHER_DOMESTIC_EMPLOYEE_ID_KEY.description: Voucher employee key ID for domestic vouchers

VOUCHER_INTERNATIONAL_COURSE_NAME_KEY.description: Course name key for international vouchers

VOUCHER_INTERNATIONAL_COURSE_NUMBER_KEY.description: Course number key for international vouchers

VOUCHER_INTERNATIONAL_EMPLOYEE_ID_KEY.description: Voucher employee key ID for international vouchers

WAGTAIL_CACHE_BACKEND.description: The caching backend to be used for Wagtail image renditions

WAGTAIL_CACHE_MAX_ENTRIES.description: The maximum number of cache entries for Wagtail images

WAGTAIL_CACHE_URL.description: URL for Wagtail image renditions cache

ZENDESK_HELP_WIDGET_ENABLED.description: Enabled/disable state for Zendesk web help widget.

ZENDESK_HELP_WIDGET_KEY.description: Represents the key for Zendesk web help widget.
